alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cleveland and southwestern Pottawatomie Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tribbey, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tribbey, Etowah, Macomb, and Trousdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Severe weather is not expected and no warnings are anticipated at this time. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
